DOC.brief_summary: PF-03526299, a novel anti-inflammatory agent should attenuate the effect of a bronchial allergen challenge on lung function and hence provide proof of mechanism for this agent.
DOC.brief_title: A Study To Assess The Effect Of PF-03526299 On Lung Function Following An Allergen Challenge In Asthmatic Subjects
DOC.criteria: Males and females 1860 years Mild asthma Atopic to allergens Unstable asthma Smokers or recent exsmokers Recent allergen challenge
